const songList = document.getElementById("song-list");
const audio = document.getElementById("audio");
const currentSong = document.getElementById("current-song");

// Populate list
songs.forEach(song => {
  const li = document.createElement("li");
  li.textContent = song.replace(".mp3", "");
  li.addEventListener("click", () => playSong(song));
  songList.appendChild(li);
});

function playSong(filename) {
  const encoded = encodeURIComponent(filename); // supports spaces & special chars
  audio.src = `songs/${encoded}`;
  audio.play();
  currentSong.textContent = filename.replace(".mp3", "");
}
